price: Оё ин [оташу азоби] ҷодуст ё [ҳанӯз ҳам онро] намебинед?
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
